text: Hiroden-ajina is a Hiroden station on Hiroden Miyajima Line, located in Ajina, Hatsukaichi, Hiroshima. ==Routes== From Hiroden-ajina Station, there is one of Hiroden Streetcar routes. *28px Hiroshima Station - Hiroden-miyajima-guchi Route ==Connections== ;█ Miyajima Line :28px ::Ajina-higashi — Hiroden-ajina — Hiroden-miyajima-guchi ==Other services connections== ===JR lines=== *JR lines connections at JR Ajina Station :JR Ajina Station is directly connected from Hiroden-ajina Station by the overpass. ==Around station== *JR Ajina Station ==History== *Opened as "Tajiri" on August 1, 1978. *Renamed to "Hiroden-ajina" on November 1, 2001. ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes Category:Hiroden Miyajima Line stations Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1978
title: Hiroden-ajina Station
